entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make IFormattingInteractionService.GetFormattingChangesAsync synchronous #62003
  • Multi-caret paste into raw string does not indent correctly #62000
  • File types should work with EnC #61999
  • Make AbstractCodeActionComputer.GetIndentationAfter async #61998
  • FadeOutComplexObjectInitialization and FadeOutComplexCollectionInitialization options are not tested #61992
  • Revise `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` behavior when records are inherited #61991
  • Inheriting multiple generic collections, LINQ extensions lose smart hints #61985
  • Unable to use latest Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* 4.3.x packages #61979
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61977

Closed

  • C# Code Generator and Code Analyzer don't Recognize Nested Enum as Belonging to Current Generic Class #61281
    Backlog
  • Convert to interpolated string adds (object) to everything #61346
    17.3
  • Creating a value tuple with a non-existent field results in a confusing CS8619 #61462
    17.3
  • Mismatch between CSDiagnostic line number in message and location #61960
    17.3
  • VS doesn't navigate to Source Link for Console.WriteLine #61942
  • Inheriting multiple generic collections, LINQ extensions lose smart hints #61986
  • Embedded language detector and overloads #61982
  • Completion suggestion item bugs #61980
  • StringSyntax doesn't work on an attribute property assignment #61947
  • SemanticModel ignores evaluation context introduced by checked/unchecked expression #60419
    17.3
  • checked expression containing switch expression has no effect #61843
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Add analyzers to unnecessary nullable directives #62004
    Area-IDE
  • Read syntax tree, source text and options synchronously in command handlers #62002
    Area-IDE
  • Fix deadlock during the startup of diagnostics #62001
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61997
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify embedded languages type hierarchy #61994
    Area-IDE
  • Move `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` from `EqualityContract` get accessor to the property itself #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix stack overflow in CSharpStringIndentationService #61978
    Area-IDE
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense

Merged

  • Simplify brace completion code. #61996
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add a fast exit check for type-argument-list brace completion to help avoid semantic work when unnecessary #61995
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Point workitems to the PR & clarification comment #61988
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Do not add cast to object when converting string.Format to interpolated string #61969
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Skip assignment nullability warning in error case #61895
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Read editorconfig options from the editor in GetInferredFormattingOptions #61968
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61989
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add all references when finding symbols in implementation assemblies #61953
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not report populate switch diagnostic when switch type is unknown #61809
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61987
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support embedded lang features when overload resolution fails #61984
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61983
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix reported accessibility issues with StackTrace Explorer #61970
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix race condition in FixAll tests based off TrackNodes functionality #61958
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix logic issue in find-refs that could fail to find related symbols in inheritance #61972
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61981
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support embedded languages on named attribute arguments #61951
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61975
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bind switch expression with checked-aware binder #61890
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • Global options tests #61872
    Area-IDE
  • Do not show name suggestions after event name #61807
    Area-IDE, Community
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Support virtual conversion and equality operators #61963
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Shadow Copy all analyzer dependencies #61974
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add compliance pipeline for running APIScan #61905
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Editor config mapping #61899
    Area-IDE
  • Use native azdo command for checkout #61965
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Simplify implementation of the FindRefsCache helper type #61941
    Area-IDE
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
